overview: The best of Windham Hill representing over 25 years of music and magical moments in artist videos. To Be {Montreux} Aerial Boundaries {Michael Hedges} Clockwork {Alex de Grassi} Cast Your Fate to the Wind {George Winston} The Bricklayers Beautiful Daughter {Will Ackerman} Bradley's Dream {Liz Story} Night in That Land {Nightnoise} New Electric India {Shadowfax} Carol of the Bells {Windham Hill Artists} Dream {Tuck & Patti} The Gift {Jim Brickman, Collin Raye, Susan Ashton Companions {David Arkenstone} Reflections of Passion {Yanni}
title: Solace - A Windham Hill Collection
